welcome.title: Welcome to Plan Cascade
welcome.description: Your AI-powered cascading development framework. Decompose complex projects into parallel executable tasks with multi-agent collaboration.
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you set up in just a few steps.

provider.title: Choose Your LLM Provider
provider.description: Select the AI provider that will power your code generation and orchestration.

claudeCode.name: Claude Code
claudeCode.description: Uses your existing Claude Code subscription. No additional API key needed.

claudeApi.name: Anthropic API
claudeApi.description: Direct Anthropic API access with Claude models. Requires an API key.

openai.name: OpenAI
openai.description: Use OpenAI GPT models for code generation. Requires an API key.

deepseek.name: DeepSeek
deepseek.description: DeepSeek specialized coding models. Requires an API key.

ollama.name: Ollama (Local)
ollama.description: Run models locally with Ollama. No API key needed, fully private.

apiKey.title: Enter Your API Key
apiKey.description: Provide the API key for {{provider}}. Your key is stored locally and never transmitted to third parties.
apiKey.noKeyRequired: No API key is required for {{provider}}. You can proceed to the next step.
apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.hint: Your API key will be stored securely in your local settings.
apiKey.invalid: API key appears to be invalid
apiKey.formatError: API key format does not match expected pattern

workspace.title: Set Your Default Workspace
workspace.description: Choose the default directory where Plan Cascade will look for your projects.
workspace.label: Workspace Directory
workspace.hint: You can always change this later in Settings.
workspace.skipHint: You can skip this step and set a workspace later.

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Plan Cascade is configured and ready to use. Here's a summary of your choices:
complete.tourPrompt: Would you like a quick tour of the application?

simple.title: Simple Mode
simple.description: One-click execution with AI-driven automation. Just describe your task and Plan Cascade handles the rest, from PRD generation to code delivery.

expert.title: Expert Mode
expert.description: Full control over PRD editing, agent selection, and execution strategies. Perfect for complex projects requiring fine-grained orchestration.

claudeCode.title: Claude Code Mode
claudeCode.description: Interactive chat interface with Claude Code CLI. Send messages, attach files, and watch real-time streaming responses with tool usage.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Browse and resume Claude Code sessions. View project history, manage checkpoints, and pick up where you left off across multiple workspaces.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Track API usage, costs, and execution metrics. Monitor token consumption, response times, and success rates across all your projects.

settings.rerunWizardDescription: Walk through the initial configuration wizard again.
settings.replayTourDescription: Take the guided tour of application features.
